BNC User Reference Guide

<valSource>

valSource specifies where the XAIRA indexer is to find a value.
Class att.identifiable
Declaration 
element valSource
{
   att.identifiable.attribute.ident,
   att.identifiable.attribute.ns,
   attribute type { "element" | "attribute" | "pseudo" },
   attribute caseFold { text }?,
   ( nameList?, ( defaultVal | labelGen )? )
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes and those inherited from [att.identifiable ] )
type indicates the kind of value to be found.
Status: Required
Legal values are:
element element content.
attribute attribute content.
pseudo content returned by one of the pseudo- functions count(), sysid(), or lineno() .
caseFold indicates whether the value required should be casefolded or not.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1)
Default: false
Module module-from-bncxml
